roleset.name: to free from an obligation

example.name: exempt-v: all arguments
example.text: They make the argument in letters to the agency about rule changes proposed [*] this past summer that , among other things , [*T*]would exempt many middle-management executives from [*-2] reporting trades in their own companies ' shares .
example.arg: [*-2] reporting trades in their own companies ' shares

example.name: exempt-j
example.text: People tell each other what to do all day every day , why-1 should countries be exempt ?

example.name: exemption-n: LVB
example.text: Los Angeles council members voted Wednesday to make an exemption to its self-imposed boycott of Arizona
example.arg: to its self-imposed boycott of Arizona

roleset.note: EXEMPT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'exempt' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from exempt.01-v predicate notes)
EXEMPT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from exempt.01-j)
